channel.title: [Hyperion] server ready pause
channel.description: I've worked out as many script issues as I could, I am not getting any error messages when I go to run the server, at the end of run server it says: [code]REMAINDER: Fix the 508+objects dumped lul. ((date and time)) org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Ready[/code] But the server window never forms, I thought that this was just a doss window text only server so I went to open client, but, there's no client launcher in the client folder I have... ^_^ woops...

item.title: [Hyperion] server ready pause
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

There isn’t anything wrong :p. You just need a proper client to connect to Hyperion, like Jmood said the prompt says the server si ready to accept connections.

edit:

Motenchu:

shouldn’t a server pop up? all thats there is the base dos window. server window appears

Nope :P. Just a DOS window will pop up saying that the server is able to receive connections.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] server ready pause
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I don’t understand what the problem is, the prompt is saying the server is ready. If you need a client then download a client that is compatible with Hyperion.

@Motenchu wrote:

I’ve worked out as many script issues as I could, I am not getting any error messages when I go to run the server, at the end of run server it says:

REMAINDER: Fix the 508+objects dumped lul. ((date and time)) org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Ready
But the server window never forms, I thought that this was just a doss window text only server so I went to open client, but, there’s no client launcher in the client folder I have… woops…
